name: business_id
description: Unique identifier for the client company.

name: cpa_firm_id
description: CPA firm managing this client company.

name: ein
description: Employer Identification Number (EIN) of the business.

name: contact_name
description: Name of the business contact person.

name: contact_phone
description: Phone number of the business contact person.

name: contact_email
description: Email address of the business contact person.

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the business record was created.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when the business record was last updated.
